title: Can't Rename Rune Pages
body: ^Title. Even when I delete a page and try to edit it from scratch - won't save a title change.

replies.body:
After typing in the new name for the rune page, are you hitting the *ENTER* key? It's important to do this, as this is the way to confirm a change to the name, the *save changes* button won't update the name.

Let me know if this helped.
Hi - just tried this and wanted to let you know it works! Didn't see this tip in the client. Thanks mucho

Hello,
Firstly, could you try and repair your client:
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool

Secondly, it's safer to use simple page names with no special characters, no homonymy.
